text: 28.12-13: Mt 27.64Kamatɨhu Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋɨndu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga Israel hatindu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ tɨhɨruta, kuyu mu sɨmahamu. Kamata saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbahɨrɨs sambɨ ŋguta, ambamu, Uta nɨmavamba ambamara, Kɨvɨyɨ karɨhaharɨŋgarɨŋ, nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ pata nuŋandɨ patɨ ha kipa mɨŋayu, vamba ambamara.
